movies.title: Space Firebird
movies.originalTitle: Hi no tori 2772: Ai no kosumozon
movies.plot: The 2720s: The Earth is in decay and so are many of its colonies. A young and terrible kid is growing up by himself in a single-room "kindergarten cell" surrounded by the high-tech of the new millennium. For one of his birthdays, he receives an android nurse: beautiful woman-transformer, programmed to teach and protect the kid. Eventually the kid grows, gets accepted in the Space Academy and discovers enemies and friends as he races through the known Universe in the search for the Space Firebird, a semi-mythical creature of energy. In an effort to know the race of such a tenacious explorer, the creature "enters" the android and falls in love with its master and friend.
movies.simplePlot: In the year 2772, a young cadet is sent to capture a mystical universal Phoenix, which possesses the power to rejuvenate the drained Earth.

biography.bio: Kaneto Shiozawa was born on January 28, 1954 in Tokyo, Japan as Toshikazu Shiozawa. He was an actor, known for Vampire Hunter D (1985), Metal Gear Solid (1998) and Street Fighter II: V (1995). He died on May 10, 2000 in Shinjuku, Tokyo.
biography.name: Kaneto Shiozawa

biography.bio: Keiko Takeshita was born on September 15, 1953 in Nagoya, Japan. She is an actress, known for From Up on Poppy Hill (2011), Le vent se lève (2013) and Wagahai wa shufu de aru (2006). She has been married to Teruo Sekiguchi since 1984.
biography.name: Keiko Takeshita

biography.bio: Hiroshi Ôtake was born on March 14, 1932 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Akira (1988), Speed Racer (1967) and Gekisou Sentai Carranger (1996).
biography.name: Hiroshi Ôtake

biography.bio: Katsue Miwa is an actress, known for Iria: Zeiram the Animation (1993), Unico (1981) and Unico in the Island of Magic (1983).
biography.name: Katsue Miwa

biography.bio: Kazue Takahashi was born on March 20, 1928. She was an actress, known for Space Firebird (1980), Tetsujin nijûhachi-go (1963) and Makko (1970). She died on March 23, 1999.
biography.name: Kazue Takahashi

biography.bio: Kazuo Kumakura was born on January 30, 1927 in Minato, Tokyo, Japan. He was an actor, known for Panda! Go Panda! (1972), Astroboy (1980) and Panda, petit panda (1973). He died on October 12, 2015 in Tokyo.
biography.name: Kazuo Kumakura

biography.bio: Masatô Ibu was born on March 28, 1949 in Nakano, Tokyo, Japan as Satoru Murota. He is an actor and writer, known for Empire of the Sun (1987), Gohatto (1999) and Sway (2006).
biography.name: Masatô Ibu

biography.bio: Osamu Kobayashi was born on November 22, 1934 in Tokyo, Japan. He was an actor, known for Dans les Alpes avec Annette (1983), The Golden Bat (1966) and Space Firebird (1980). He died on June 28, 2011 in Bunkyo, Tokyo.
biography.name: Osamu Kobayashi

biography.bio: Shûichi Ikeda was born on December 2, 1949 in Nakano, Japan. He is an actor, known for Kenshin le Vagabond - Le Chapitre de la Mémoire (1999), Bubblegum Crisis (1987) and Mobile Suit Gundam III: Encounters in Space (1982). He is married to Sakiko Tamagawa.
biography.name: Shûichi Ikeda

biography.bio: Shûichirô Moriyama was born on July 26, 1934 in Nagoya, Japan. He is an actor, known for Porco Rosso (1992), Ninja Scroll (1993) and Shall We Dance? (1996).
biography.name: Shûichirô Moriyama

biography.bio: Toshiko Fujita was born on April 5, 1950 in Dalian, Liaoning, China. She is an actress, known for Signé Cat's Eyes (1983), Wicked City (1987) and Alien Defender Geo-Armor: Kishin Corps (1993).
biography.name: Toshiko Fujita

biography.bio: Yasuo Hisamatsu was born on June 6, 1919 in Tokyo, Japan as Hiroshi Takahashi. He was an actor, known for Galaxy Express 999 (1979), The Men Who Tread on the Tiger's Tail (1945) and Dracula (1980). He died on June 15, 1982.
biography.name: Yasuo Hisamatsu

awards.award: Academy of Science Fiction, Fantasy & Horror Films, USA 1983
